Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-11731 affecting package libxslt for versions less than 1.1.43-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-11731 affecting package libxslt for versions less than 1.1.43-3. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package libxslt is earlier than 1.1.43-3, affected by CVE-2025-11731
